About

I’m a PhD candidate supported by a CIFRE contract between the Inria Randopt team and Thales. My advisor is Nikolaus Hansen.

My research interests are:

  • Continuous constrained optimization
  • Evolution strategies
  • Radar digital signal processing
  • Machine learning
